episodes.title: Terrance and Phillip in Not Without My Anus
episodes.plot: Terrance and Phillip must go to Iran to rescue Terrance's kidnapped daughter. Meanwhile Saddam Hussein takes over Canada.

episodes.title: Cartman's Mom is Still a Dirty Slut
episodes.plot: The boys get snowed in at the hospital while waiting to learn the identity of Cartman's father. Meanwhile, the townspeople resort to cannibalism when they get snowed in.

episodes.title: Chickenlover
episodes.plot: Mr. Barbrady goes back to school after it is discovered that he is illiterate. As he learns to read, a criminal is on the loose molesting all the chickens in South Park.

episodes.title: Ike's Wee Wee
episodes.plot: Mr. Mackey is fired from school after losing a marijuana sample in class and winds up becoming a druggie, and Kyle tries to keep his brother Ike from having his bris after he finds out what will take place during the ceremony.

episodes.title: Conjoined Fetus Lady
episodes.plot: The people of South Park attempt to raise awareness of the school nurse's disability. Meanwhile, the boys travel to China to compete in a dodge ball championship.

episodes.title: The Mexican Staring Frog of Southern Sri Lanka
episodes.plot: The kids get revenge on Jimbo and Ned after they fail their report on Vietnam. However, their practical joke sparks a fierce ratings war between "Jesus and Pals" and Jimbo and Ned's hunting program.

episodes.title: City on the Edge of Forever
episodes.plot: As their school bus teeters over the edge of a cliff, the boys recall past memories.

episodes.title: Summer Sucks
episodes.plot: Summer at South park is not going well: fireworks are banned, and a giant ash snake is ravaging the countryside.

episodes.title: Chef's Chocolate Salty Balls
episodes.plot: Hollywood big-shots try to turn South Park into another Sundance. However, they wreak havoc on the town's eco-system, which could cause Mr. Hankey to die.

episodes.title: Chickenpox
episodes.plot: The boys get angry and seek revenge when they discover that their parents orchestrated a sleepover at Kenny's house so that they could all get chickenpox.

episodes.title: Roger Ebert Should Lay Off the Fatty Foods
episodes.plot: The boys investigate a mysterious conspiracy centered around the South Park Planetarium. Meanwhile, Cartman auditions for a TV commercial.

episodes.title: Clubhouses
episodes.plot: Stan builds a clubhouse so he can play truth or dare with Wendy. Meanwhile, he deals with his parents' unexpected divorce.

episodes.title: Cow Days
episodes.plot: All of South Park's cows become mesmerized by the town's new Wooden Cow Memorial. Meanwhile, the kids' plan to win a Terence and Philip doll from a carney at the Cow Days festival becomes complicated and dangerous.

episodes.title: Chef Aid
episodes.plot: The boys organize a music festival to raise money when Chef is sued by a record company.

episodes.title: Spookyfish
episodes.plot: Stan thinks his new pet fish is evil after it kills two people in his bedroom. Also, the parallel-universe version of Cartman shows up in South Park, and everyone likes him more than the real Cartman.

episodes.title: Merry Christmas Charlie Manson!
episodes.plot: Stan, Kyle and Kenny go to Nebraska to spend Christmas with Eric's family. Meanwhile, Charlie Manson escapes from prison with Eric's uncle, and the boys help teach him the true meaning of Christmas.

episodes.title: Gnomes
episodes.plot: A school assignment pairs the boys up with Tweek, a neurotic boy who claims that gnomes are stealing his underwear. Meanwhile, Tweek's father fights against a corporation that is stealing his business.

episodes.title: Prehistoric Ice Man
episodes.plot: Kyle and Stan fight over what to name a man they found frozen in ice from 1996. Meanwhile, the government attempts to steal the frozen man.
